2083

A showcase for contemporary art
pieces located somewhere
between art and design.
Informed by a simple impulse or
thought and influenced by
process and circumstance, the
work attempts to present the
qualities inherent in an object or
material.

A piece of chalk
Tops
Packing tape cones

Found objects
